statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -4 \\ 12 \\ -8 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 14 \\ -20 \\ 42 \\ -16 \\ 6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -2 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
